name: OVOCAPER
description:
In OVOCAPER, you take on the role of a hungry little dog that steals eggs! Luckily, you’re on a nice patch of land with hens that lay eggs, sit on them and grow them until they hatch. Just swipe your way to the eggs - bigger eggs mean a bigger score and a full tummy! Move around too much without collecting eggs, and you’ll STARVE!

Seems easy enough, right? Too bad the hens aren’t too fond of your antics. In fact, it’s probably best to not get caught in their unbridled rage!! 

But maybe… you’ll find something to protect yourself?

The stakes are high in OVOCAPER! 

  • Easy to pick up, hard to master!
  • No ads, no costs - Just have fun with this!
  • No scoreboard or anything - If you want to share your highscore with your friends, take a screenshot or something, I dunno!

Controls:

  • Arrow keys / Swiping: Move in one of 4 directions
  • Enter / Space: Restart game after Game Over (or just press the button)
  • F4: Resize Window (downloaded version only)

OVOCAPER is also available on the Google Play Store!
